how long does it take to write lyrics

2000 years?

I want you to remember the time.

It was a hit.

There was no such thing as a large

it would have been a problem if it

I'm glad I didn't think about that much

So it's not like it's going to be a big

or it's not going to sell at all.
It's a period like that.

I don't think I'll be able to sell like
Sazan anymore.
So I think I know where I stand.
You know where you stand.

It's a great thing to be able to be
there.
It's such a great age, isn't it?

I don't think we need to think about

There was a commercial for that.

It was called the Black Building in

There was a CBS-Sony logo on the roof of

That was cool.
It was a good commercial.

I admired that logo.
I was glad I could shoot right under it.

Yes, I was shooting from here.
What was that?
What was that? Eyeball?
It was like a foot in an eyeball.

It's still the same as it was in the old
days.
I thought that was cool.

By the way, in the video, Maruyama-san

It's nostalgic.
At the time, I had three Sony's.
The CBS Sony, Epic Sony, and Q Sony.
Do I have them now?
I was in the CBS Sony.
